column4: you would need to have some source repositories in your /etc/apt/sources.list, so synaptic can fetch source packages.
should i put those CVS lines in my sources?
take a look at /etc/apt/sources.list with an editor like gedit, you will see some lines beginning with #deb-src in it. Remove those '#' signs to activate them (make a backup of the file first)
you might also be able to activate the source repositories from within synaptic.
